Posts.EditableText: Okay i want to make my game pretty long and have the player be able to have multiple save games. is that possible with qdk pro or even custom build? This probably has a simple answer but i just can't seem to find it. I've been avoiding making passwords because I want to have alot of my game customizable so a password would have to be too complex to keep track of or even for me to make. Anyone have a solution for this.
